Posts.Content: STT55 wrote: I recently had a lumpectomy with clear margins of 1.4mm.  Everything I have read says that it would be preferential to have > = 2.0mm and I am currently scheduled to go back into surgery to increase the margins,  but it sounds as though the medical community is debating the need to have 2.0 margins.  Before I go into surgery I would like to have more facts.  Has anyone read any studies that would provide me more information?   I'd appreciate any tibit of information. Dx 7/25/2011, IDC, 1cm, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
